title: Use Kanban to coordinate Phase 2 development
description: Drive all Phase 2 features through Kanban task management and self-assignment.
userStories: As a builder, I want to fully coordinate Phase 2 using the tool we just built.
As a system, I want to demonstrate recursive orchestration capacity.
successCriteria: All Phase 2 tasks exist as cards
Each card is assigned to a branch
Each card's status reflects actual system progress
